recipes.title: Pasta Carbonara
recipes.description: Creamy pasta with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
recipes.ingredients: Pasta, eggs, parmesan cheese, pancetta, black pepper, garlic.
recipes.steps: 1. Boil pasta. 2. Cook pancetta. 3. Mix eggs with cheese. 4. Combine all.

recipes.title: Chicken Stir Fry
recipes.description: A quick and easy stir fry with chicken and vegetables.
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, bell peppers, onions, soy sauce, garlic, ginger.
recipes.steps: 1. Slice chicken and veggies. 2. Stir fry with soy sauce and spices.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta with a rich meat sauce.
recipes.ingredients: Spaghetti, ground beef, tomatoes, garlic, onion, carrots, celery.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Make the Bolognese sauce with ground beef.

recipes.title: Vegetable Soup
recipes.description: Healthy and hearty vegetable soup.
recipes.ingredients: Carrots, celery, onions, tomatoes, spinach, vegetable broth.
recipes.steps: 1. Chop vegetables. 2. Cook with broth until soft.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.description: Classic grilled cheese with buttery toasted bread.
recipes.ingredients: Bread, cheese, butter.
recipes.steps: 1. Butter bread. 2. Grill until golden and melted.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Mexican tacos with seasoned beef and toppings.
recipes.ingredients: Ground beef, taco shells, lettuce, cheese, salsa.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook beef with seasoning. 2. Assemble tacos with toppings.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: A classic salad with grilled chicken and Caesar dressing.
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing.
recipes.steps: 1. Grill chicken. 2. Assemble salad with lettuce and croutons.

recipes.title: Fish Tacos
recipes.description: Crispy fish fillets in soft tacos with fresh toppings.
recipes.ingredients: Fish fillets, taco shells, cabbage, salsa, lime.
recipes.steps: 1. Fry fish fillets. 2. Assemble tacos with cabbage and salsa.

recipes.title: Egg Salad
recipes.description: Creamy egg salad with mayonnaise and mustard.
recipes.ingredients: Eggs, mayonnaise, mustard, salt, pepper.
recipes.steps: 1. Boil eggs. 2. Mix with mayo and mustard.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes with syrup and butter.
recipes.ingredients: Flour, eggs, milk, baking powder, syrup, butter.
recipes.steps: 1. Mix ingredients. 2. Cook on a griddle until golden.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.description: Creamy pasta with grilled chicken and Alfredo sauce.
recipes.ingredients: Pasta, chicken, heavy cream, parmesan cheese, garlic.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook pasta and chicken. 2. Make Alfredo sauce and combine.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: A healthy stir fry with mixed vegetables.
recipes.ingredients: Carrots, bell peppers, broccoli, soy sauce, garlic.
recipes.steps: 1. Slice vegetables. 2. Stir fry with soy sauce.

recipes.title: Hamburgers
recipes.description: Classic burgers with beef patties and fresh toppings.
recipes.ingredients: Ground beef, buns, lettuce, tomato, cheese.
recipes.steps: 1. Grill beef patties. 2. Assemble burgers with toppings.

recipes.title: Lasagna
recipes.description: Layers of pasta, meat sauce, and cheese.
recipes.ingredients: Lasagna noodles, ground beef, ricotta, mozzarella, marinara sauce.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook noodles. 2. Layer with sauce and cheese. 3. Bake.

recipes.title: Quiche
recipes.description: Savory pie with eggs, cheese, and vegetables.
recipes.ingredients: Eggs, cheese, spinach, pie crust, cream.
recipes.steps: 1. Mix eggs with cream and cheese. 2. Bake in pie crust.

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon
recipes.description: Deliciously grilled salmon with lemon and herbs.
recipes.ingredients: Salmon, lemon, garlic, olive oil, rosemary.
recipes.steps: 1. Season salmon with lemon and herbs. 2. Grill until cooked.

recipes.title: Cheese Pizza
recipes.description: Classic pizza topped with melted cheese and marinara sauce.
recipes.ingredients: Pizza dough, mozzarella cheese, marinara sauce.
recipes.steps: 1. Roll out dough. 2. Add sauce and cheese. 3. Bake.

recipes.title: Chicken Wings
recipes.description: Crispy chicken wings coated in flavorful sauce.
recipes.ingredients: Chicken wings, hot sauce, butter, garlic.
recipes.steps: 1. Bake or fry wings. 2. Toss in sauce.

recipes.title: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.description: Crispy chicken cutlets topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese.
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, breadcrumbs, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese.
recipes.steps: 1. Bread and fry chicken cutlets. 2. Top with sauce and cheese. 3. Bake.

recipes.title: Crispy Tofu Stir Fry
recipes.description: Tofu stir-fried with vegetables and soy sauce.
recipes.ingredients: Tofu, soy sauce, bell peppers, onions, garlic, ginger.
recipes.steps: 1. Fry tofu until crispy. 2. Stir fry vegetables. 3. Combine with tofu and sauce.

recipes.title: Pork Schnitzel
recipes.description: Breaded and fried pork cutlets served with lemon.
recipes.ingredients: Pork, breadcrumbs, egg, flour, lemon.
recipes.steps: 1. Bread the pork cutlets. 2. Fry until golden. 3. Serve with lemon.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: A creamy rice dish made with mushrooms and parmesan.
recipes.ingredients: Arborio rice, mushrooms, onions, garlic, parmesan, vegetable broth.
recipes.steps: 1. Saut√© mushrooms and onions. 2. Add rice and broth. 3. Stir until creamy.

recipes.title: Sushi Rolls
recipes.description: Homemade sushi rolls with rice, seaweed, and fillings.
recipes.ingredients: Sushi rice, seaweed, tuna, cucumber, avocado, soy sauce.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook rice and cool. 2. Lay out seaweed, add rice and fillings. 3. Roll and slice.

recipes.title: Falafel
recipes.description: Crispy fried balls made from chickpeas and herbs.
recipes.ingredients: Chickpeas, garlic, parsley, cumin, flour, oil.
recipes.steps: 1. Blend chickpeas and herbs. 2. Form balls and fry.

recipes.title: Baked Ziti
recipes.description: Baked pasta dish with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese.
recipes.ingredients: Ziti pasta, marinara sauce, mozzarella, parmesan cheese.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook pasta and mix with sauce. 2. Layer with cheese and bake.

recipes.title: Grilled Shrimp
recipes.description: Shrimp marinated and grilled to perfection.
recipes.ingredients: Shrimp, garlic, olive oil, lemon, parsley.
recipes.steps: 1. Marinate shrimp with garlic and lemon. 2. Grill until cooked.

recipes.title: Vegan Chili
recipes.description: Hearty chili made with beans and vegetables.
recipes.ingredients: Beans, tomatoes, bell peppers, onions, chili powder.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook vegetables. 2. Add beans and spices. 3. Simmer until thick.

recipes.title: Beef Stew
recipes.description: Tender beef simmered with vegetables in a rich broth.
recipes.ingredients: Beef, carrots, potatoes, onions, beef broth.
recipes.steps: 1. Brown beef. 2. Add vegetables and broth. 3. Simmer until tender.

recipes.title: Frittata
recipes.description: An Italian-style omelette with eggs and vegetables.
recipes.ingredients: Eggs, spinach, onions, mushrooms, cheese.
recipes.steps: 1. Saut√© vegetables. 2. Pour beaten eggs over and cook until set.

recipes.title: Shakshuka
recipes.description: Poached eggs in a spicy tomato sauce.
recipes.ingredients: Eggs, tomatoes, onions, garlic, cumin, paprika.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook onions and tomatoes. 2. Crack eggs into sauce and cook until set.

recipes.title: Eggplant Parmesan
recipes.description: Breaded eggplant slices layered with marinara and mozzarella.
recipes.ingredients: Eggplant, marinara sauce, mozzarella, parmesan cheese.
recipes.steps: 1. Bread and fry eggplant. 2. Layer with sauce and cheese, then bake.

recipes.title: Pad Thai
recipes.description: Stir-fried noodles with shrimp, peanuts, and lime.
recipes.ingredients: Rice noodles, shrimp, eggs, peanuts, lime, soy sauce.
recipes.steps: 1. Stir fry noodles and shrimp. 2. Add eggs and peanuts.

recipes.title: Ceviche
recipes.description: Fresh fish marinated in lime juice with onions and cilantro.
recipes.ingredients: Fish, lime juice, onions, cilantro, tomatoes.
recipes.steps: 1. Marinate fish in lime juice. 2. Add onions, tomatoes, and cilantro.

recipes.title: Chicken Fried Rice
recipes.description: Fried rice with chicken, vegetables, and soy sauce.
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, rice, soy sauce, peas, carrots, eggs.
recipes.steps: 1. Cook chicken and vegetables. 2. Stir fry rice and soy sauce.
